snippet: There were conflicting reports on how many people died when a turboprop aircraft hit homes in East Haven, Conn.
abstract: Private plane piloted by Bill Henningsgaard and carrying his 17-year-old son Maxwell crashes into home in East Haven, Conn, after leaving from Teterboro Airport in New Jersey, killing both occupants of plane; woman who lived in house escapes unharmed but her two children are presumed dead.

byline.contributor: Nick Corasaniti and Channing Joseph contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: There were conflicting reports on how many people died when a turboprop aircraft hit homes in East Haven, Conn.

headline.main: Deadly Plane Crash in a Connecticut Neighborhood
headline.print_headline: Deadly Plane Crash in a Connecticut Neighborhood
